page.title: 08East Hagbourne Employment
page.content: There are few employers in the area other than farmers and small shopkeepers. Most people have to travel the larger cities to work. There are also a high proportion of pensioners in the area. The largest employer in the village is Hagbourne Garage which employs four staff.Rayner and Son (Building Supplies and Haulage) employs 3 people, while the post office stores employ 5 part time staff and 1 full timer. Two of the three pubs employ the landlords and their wives with the third having three employees each night. There are one or two self employed people in the village like Geo. J Napper, a Builder/craftsman in wood and A.E.Designs, an architect, while Pauline's Personnel finds temporary employment for about 12 people. There is also a Funeral Director in the village.
